subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Azinger is driven by a burning desire to reverse the recent downward trend of three straight losses, the last by a record margin, and a 1-5 record in the past six Ryder Cups.
snippet: Paul Azinger is driven by a burning desire to reverse the recent downward trend of three straight losses, the last by a record margin, and a 1-5 record in the past six Ryder Cups.
